name: AWS CLI on Heroku
description: For quick remote access to the AWS CLI tool.

HEROKU_URL.description: The URL of this Heroku app.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Set your AWS Access Key ID to enable S3 file storage. Leave blank to disable file uploads.

AWS_ACCESS_SECRET_KEY.description: AWS Access Secret Key, if using S3 file storage.

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: Region of your S3 bucket on AWS, if using S3 file storage.
